item.title: Instructions: May 4
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: Goals for this week set up Github, Hypothes.is accounts, Zotero join the Hypothes.is course group explore our ignorance: what is dighist? Listen intro podcast Do Follow the instructions for Setting Up Github, Setting up Hypothesis, and Setting up Zotero. Read These readings have two aims. One, to ground the fact of the digital in the physicality of the world; Two, to give you a sense of the potentials.

item.title: Setting up your Zotero
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: [A tutorial on how to get, how to install, and how to use Zotero to keep track of what you read. Right-click and open in a new window.](https://uclalibrary.github.io/slides/tutorial-zotero-intro.html)
